Bash(git -C /Users/mfelbapov/Projects/ohmyword commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix inflection engine bugs and expand vocabulary to 105 words

Phase 1 - Engine bug fixes for existing 35 words:
- Strip diacritics at dispatcher level via new Transliteration module
- Rename tags: invariable "base"->"invariable", adverb "comp"/"super"
  ->"comparative"/"superlative", pronoun tags get _sg/_pl suffixes
- Add extended_stem, palatalization/sibilarization plural, ins_ju support
  to nouns; remove incorrect animate acc_pl->gen_pl redirect
- Add past_stem, present_conjugation_class overrides, ASCII "ci" stem
  handling to verbs; je-verb bare-j imperative rule
- Fix adjective fleeting_a and comparative/superlative stem handling
- Add unified gender-neutral entries to dva numeral paradigm

Phase 2 - Expand seed from 36 to 105 words:
- 21 nouns \(all 5 declension classes\), 17 verbs \(all conjugation
  classes including irregular\), 10 adjectives, 8 pronouns, 4 numerals,
  9 invariables \(prepositions, conjunctions, adverb, particle\)

Phase 3 - TDD validation loop until all 105 words pass:
- Added irregular_forms metadata for words with suppletive/irregular
  paradigms \(otac, put, prijatelj, drvo, ruka gen_pl, etc.\)
- Added ASCII "sta" lookup for interrogative pronouns

All 1156 tests pass, all 105 seed words validated.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/mfelbapov/Projects/ohmyword add lib/ohmyword/linguistics/adjectives.ex lib/ohmyword/linguistics/nouns.ex priv/repo/vocabulary_seed.json test/ohmyword/linguistics/adjectives_test.exs mix.lock)

Bash(git -C /Users/mfelbapov/Projects/ohmyword commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix 3 inflection engine bugs and expand vocabulary to 284 words

Fix soft-stem adjective definite endings \(-eg/-em instead of -og/-om\),
fix fleeting-a + palatalization combo in noun plurals, and fix
polysyllabic consonant nouns incorrectly getting -ov-/-ev- plural insert.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/mfelbapov/Projects/ohmyword commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix bojati test: correct conjugation class to i-verb with present_stem

The test incorrectly used a-verb conjugation, producing wrong present
\(bojam/bojaš\) and imperative \(bojaj\) forms. Changed to i-verb with
present_stem "boj" to match seed data, giving correct forms \(bojim/bojiš,
boji\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
